author: Nahal Toosi
title: Mike Pompeo suddenly finds his voice on the virus
description: The secretary of state has come under fire for saying little about the pandemic. Now, he can’t stop talking about it.
content:
Global cooperation between the public and private sector will make the difference: we'll #StopTheSpread together, Pompeo tweeted on Tuesday, shortly before holding a news conference to, among other things, talk about the virus. 
Pompeos increased visibility … [+4423 chars]
